IRS990EZ.PrimaryExemptPurposeTxt: PURPOSE: TO FOSTER AMERICAN DEMOCRACY, PROMOTE ACTIVE PARTICIPATION IN CIVIC AND NATIONAL LIFE, PROVIDE AN ENVIRONMENT CONDUCIVE TO THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE INDIVIDUAL, ENCOURAGE THE PRESERVATION OF JAPANESE AMERICAN HERITAGE, SECURE JUSTICE AND EQUAL OPPORTUNIIES FOR AMERICANS OF JAPANESE ANCESTRY AS WELL AS FOR ALL INDIVIDUALS REGARDLESS OF THEIR RACE, CREED, COLOR OR NATIONAL ORIGIN. MISSION: TO PROMOTE, SPONSOR, AND ENCOURAGE PROGRAMS COMMENSURATE WITH THE PURPOSES SET FORTH ABOVE.

ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: JACL-HOUSTON WORKS TO PROMOTE THE CIVIL RIGHTS OF ALL PEOPLE BY EDUCATING THE PUBLIC ABOUT THE HISTORIC EXPERIENCES OF THE JAPANESE-AMERICAN COMMUNITY REGARDING INSTITUTIONAL RACISM, MASS IMPRISONMENT, PROPERTY FORFEITURE, AND RECISSION OF RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS. JACL HOUSTON SPONSORED AN EXHIBIT AT HOLOCAUST MUSEUM HOUSTON SHARING THE STORY OF A PREVIOUSLY LITTLE-KNOWN CAMP IN TEXAS WHERE JAPANESE AMERICANS WERE INTERNED DURING WWII. THIS EXHIBIT AND THE SURROUNDING SCHOLARSHIP SHED NEW LIGHT ON THE EXPERIENCE OF JAPANESE AMERICANS IN THE SOUTHERN STATES, WHICH HAS GENERALLY RECEIVED LESS ATTENTION THAN THAT OF THOSE IN PACIFIC STATES.

YOUTH, FELLOWSHIP, AND LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT: JACL WORKS TO INCREASE PUBLIC PARTICIPATION IN NATIONAL AND CIVIC LIFE ACROSS ALL SPECTRUMS OF SOCIETY. MEMBERSHIP IN THE LEAGUE IS ONE SUCH FORM OF PARTICPATION, AND JACL IS COMMITTED TO DEVELOPING FUTURE LEADERS ACTIVE IN THE JAPANESE- AMERICAN COMMUNITY AND PROVIDING OPPORTUNITIES FOR ALL MEMBERS TO GAIN EXPERIENCE IN THE INTERPLAY BETWEEN CIVIL RIGHTS AND PUBLIC POLICY. LOW MEMBERSHIP NUMBERS RESULT IN REDUCED ENGAGEMENT AND THREATEN THE ABILITY TO FULFILL THE MISSION OF JACL HOUSTON. IN 2022 JACL HOUSTON GREATLY EXPANDED ITS VISIBILITY WITHIN THE COMMUNITY, APPOINTING TWO VOLUNTEER OUTREACH COORDINATORS AND PROVIDING TRAINING AND TOOLS TO IMPROVE OUTREACH EFFICACY. AS A RESULT, JACL HOUSTON MORE THAN DOUBLED ITS NUMBER OF ACTIVE MEMBERS AND MULTIPLIED YOUTH MEMBERSHIP BY A FACTOR OF TEN. MEMBERSHIP RETENTION NUMBERS IMPROVED IN 2022 COMPARED TO PRIOR PERIODS, AND PLEDGES TO VOTE INCREASED, INDICATING IMPROVED COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT.

JACL-HOUSTON WORKS TO PROMOTE THE CIVIL RIGHTS OF ALL PEOPLE BY EDUCATING THE PUBLIC ABOUT THE HISTORIC EXPERIENCES OF THE JAPANESE-AMERICAN COMMUNITY REGARDING INSTITUTIONAL RACISM, MASS IMPRISONMENT, PROPERTY FORFEITURE, AND RECISSION OF RIGHTS AND FREEDOMS. JACL HOUSTON SPONSORED AN EXHIBIT AT HOLOCAUST MUSEUM HOUSTON SHARING THE STORY OF A PREVIOUSLY LITTLE-KNOWN CAMP IN TEXAS WHERE JAPANESE AMERICANS WERE INTERNED DURING WWII. THIS EXHIBIT AND THE SURROUNDING SCHOLARSHIP SHED NEW LIGHT ON THE EXPERIENCE OF JAPANESE AMERICANS IN THE SOUTHERN STATES, WHICH HAS GENERALLY RECEIVED LESS ATTENTION THAN THAT OF THOSE IN PACIFIC STATES.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: UNRESTRICTED GRANT TO FURTHER THE EXEMPT PURPOSES OF JACL 100,000

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXPENSES ADVERTISING AND OUTREACH 1,856 MEMBER GROWTH 1,856 OFFICE EXPENSES 150 INTERNET DOMAIN LEASE 35 INTERNET DOMAIN LEASE 35 CA MEETING TRAVEL 917 KATIE HOWARD INTERVIEWS 840 CA MEETING TRAVEL 916 CONSUL GENERAL, CHAMBERS, OTH 2,223 JACL MEMBERSHIPS & EVENTS 400 TOTAL 9,228
PREPAID EXPENSES AND DEFERRED CHARGES 0 3,750 TOTAL 0 3,750

PURPOSE: TO FOSTER AMERICAN DEMOCRACY, PROMOTE ACTIVE PARTICIPATION IN CIVIC AND NATIONAL LIFE, PROVIDE AN ENVIRONMENT CONDUCIVE TO THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE INDIVIDUAL, ENCOURAGE THE PRESERVATION OF JAPANESE AMERICAN HERITAGE, SECURE JUSTICE AND EQUAL OPPORTUNIIES FOR AMERICANS OF JAPANESE ANCESTRY AS WELL AS FOR ALL INDIVIDUALS REGARDLESS OF THEIR RACE, CREED, COLOR OR NATIONAL ORIGIN. MISSION: TO PROMOTE, SPONSOR, AND ENCOURAGE PROGRAMS COMMENSURATE WITH THE PURPOSES SET FORTH ABOVE.

THIS EXHIBIT AND THE SURROUNDING SCHOLARSHIP SHED NEW LIGHT ON THE EXPERIENCE OF JAPANESE AMERICANS IN THE SOUTHERN STATES, WHICH HAS GENERALLY RECEIVED LESS ATTENTION THAN THAT OF THOSE IN PACIFIC STATES.
